Title: .NET MAUI in .NET 8 Preview 5 Available:  Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements
Description: NET MAUI in .NET 8 Preview 5 is available and contains bug fixes and performance improvements for cross-platform application development. It includes changes to iOS keyboard scrolling, test improvements, performance enhancements to the {Binding} mechanism and Android label layout. The announcement provoked different emotions in the community.

Title: Value Objects in C# - Code Maze
Description: In this article, we explore Value Objects in C#. We discuss when and why we should use them, as well as looking at some of the drawbacks.

Title: Episode 125 - Mixed Reality, the Metaverse, and Making Magic Happen with Simon Jackson
Description: Simon Jackson, a Microsoft Global MVP for mixed reality, shares his expertise on the future of software development in mixed reality and the metaverse. He highlights the importance of accessibility, AI integration, and choosing the right technology to build successful virtual and augmented reality experiences. Jackson also shares inspiring examples of how mixed reality can positively impact industries such as healthcare and education, and discusses his own work on creating augmented museum experiences. This podcast is a must-listen for anyone interested in the future of technology and its potential for positive change.

Title: Build and MAUI and Recaps
Description: Microsoft Build just happened - tune in to hear David's, James', and Matt's thoughts!

Title: Microsoft Build Recap: Upgrading from Xamarin to .NET MAUI
Description: Discover what you missed at Microsoft Build 2023 regarding the migration to .NET MAUI.

Title: Crafting a better, faster code view | The GitHub Blog
Description: The new GitHub Code View brings users many new features to improve the code reading and exploration experiences, and we overcame a number of unique technical hurdles in order to deliver those features without compromising performance.
